name: Super Ultra Ball
description:
Controls

Player 1 :

  • WASD, ZQSD or joystick Dpad to move and aim
  • V or Square or X to punch
  • B or Cross or A to jump
  • N or Circle or B to perform a chargeJump


Player 2 :

  • Up Down Left Right or joystick Dpad to move and aim
  • Numpad1 or i or Square or X to punch
  • Numpad2 or O or Cross or A to jump
  • Numpad3 or P or Circle or B to perform a chargeJump
